title: Looking for players for ranked 5's
body: looking for people willing to play some semi serious ranked 5's to climb the ladder as high as possible and have some fun :D  only want people who can play fairly regularly and anything from gold up (im plat 2 promos currently and my mate who will be playing is gold 5 ) add me or reply on here ty
